com.FCI.SWE.Services

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.FCI.SWE.Services.Service

  • @Path(value="/")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public class Service
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains REST services, also contains action function for web application

    2014-02-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohamed Samir

      Action function to render Signup page, this function will be executed using url like this /rest/signup

        @GET
@Path(value="/")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response entryPoint()
        Action function to render home page of application, home page contains only signup and login buttons
        Returns:
        enty point page (Home page of this application)

@Path(value="/login")

        Returns:

      • response

        @POST
@Path(value="/response")
@Produces(value="text/plain")
public java.lang.String response(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                           java.lang.String uname,
                                           @FormParam(value="email")
                                           java.lang.String email,
                                           @FormParam(value="password")
                                           java.lang.String pass)
        Action function to response to signup request, This function will act as a controller part and it will calls RegistrationService to make registration
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Status string

      • goHome

        @POST
@Path(value="/home")
@Produces(value="text/html")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response goHome(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                                  java.lang.String uname,
                                                  @FormParam(value="password")
                                                  java.lang.String pass)
        Action function to response to login request. This function will act as a controller part, it will calls login service to check user data and get user from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        Home page view

      • registrationService

        @POST
@Path(value="/RegistrationService")
public java.lang.String registrationService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                             java.lang.String uname,
                                             @FormParam(value="email")
                                             java.lang.String email,
                                             @FormParam(value="password")
                                             java.lang.String pass)
        Registration Rest service, this service will be called to make registration. This function will store user data in data store
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        email - provided user email
        pass - provided password
        Returns:
        Status json

      • LoginService

        @POST
@Path(value="/LoginService")
public java.lang.String LoginService(@FormParam(value="uname")
                                      java.lang.String uname,
                                      @FormParam(value="password")
                                      java.lang.String pass)
        Login Rest Service, this service will be called to make login process also will check user data and returns new user from datastore
        Parameters:
        uname - provided user name
        pass - provided user password
        Returns:
        user in json format
